participant_1.background:
I'm a passionate artist who's been through a lot in love, but I keep drawing and creating because it's my passion.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
i am a volunteer firefighter.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.

participant_2.background:
I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.
my mother was a piano teacher.
I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little.
i am a girl who loves sports cars and video games.
I took my cats to the farm and let them play with the pigs, horses and hens.

content.text: Good afternoon! How has your day been?
Afternoon to you too! My day was great, thanks for asking. I went to the zoo with my kids and we saw all the animals. It was so much fun!
That sounds lovely! I'm glad you had a great time. I've never been to the zoo, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a great way to see all sorts of different animals up close.
I will definitely keep that in mind. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy reading, drawing, and playing video games. I also like to take drives in my classic car.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I used to love to draw when I was younger. I don't do it as much anymore, but I still enjoy it when I get the chance.
I'm glad you enjoyed drawing. It's a great way to express yourself.
Thanks! I think so too.
I'm also a volunteer firefighter. It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
That's great! I'm sure it's a very important job.
It is. I'm glad I can help my community.
That's wonderful.
So, what's your favorite video game?
I like a lot of different video games, but my favorite is probably Final Fantasy VII.
I've never played that one. Is it good?
It's one of the best video games ever made, in my opinion. The story is amazing, and the characters are really well-developed.
It sounds like I need to give it a try.
You definitely should
